assalomu alekum hammaga menimcha csgoni uje butun dunyo biladi va hammani oziga yarasha fikri bor bu oyin haqida shaxsan men uzbekcha kommentariya 1 ta ham kormadim shu paytkacha hamma russkiyda yoki anglizkiyda comment qoldiradi men uzbekcahda yozgm keldi.... hop o'yinga kesek ham minus ham plus taraflari juda kop o"yin juda zor lichno menga juda yoqadi ne prostoy oyin bunda kimlardir bekorchi vaqt sarfledi a kimlardir bekorchi vaqt sarflab oyin orqali pul ham topadi menga aynan shunde tip odamlar yoqadi ham oynab ham pul topishadi albatta kontent qila olish hammani ham qolidan kemedi.. tak oyinga kesek yomon tomonidan boshleman bu CHITERSTVO oyinda chiterlardan boshqa yomon taraf kormadm men... anti ham yoq bolsa ham ishlamedi chunki chitni polon polon pulga sotvolb kirishadi lekn unda nma mano bor o"zlari ham blmasa kere.. yaxshi tomonlari oyin odammi qaysidir tarafdan aqlli qiladi kimga qanaqa blmadimu men shunde deb oyleman chunki oyindagi oddiy fleshkani ham aql bn otish kere yoki ozizga zarar.. keyn csgo da dostlar orttirish dostlariz bn oynashshi oziga yarasha gashti bor brinchidan bir birilarni tushunb oynislar 2 informatsiya 3 albatta szi killariz kop bop qosa yoki ozgina yaxshiroq bolb foydez kopro tegb qosa srazu sizi maxtab ketishlarii:) agar oxrida bitta oziz qob ketb oyinni tashit qsez siz uje simple:).. tan olaman chiterlar bolmasa yaxshi oyinchilar juda kop bazida bir korishda 1 ta o"q bilan headshot qb ketishsa srazu chiter deb reportlar tashemz hammamz a bazida bosa ozimizda ham huddi shunde hol bosa ozimiz hayron bolb o"tiramz yaxshi o"yinchilar juda koppp.... yaxshi oyinchi bolish uchn ozgina trenirofka qilish va comp stoliz doim paryadkada bosa szga hichnma halaqit qmasa i mishkalarizi yaxshi ozizga moslab tuzvolsez boldi... o"yinni 'ylab topkan odamga RAHMAT aytaman menga juda ham yoqadi va albatta dostlar orasida oynashka yetadigani yoq:),,,,,

I bought Prime to avoid hackers, then I had a 20 minute queue because of "low trust" (???). After winning one game I couldn't play with my friends anymore because "the ranks are too far apart" (with Silver II).
So the game basically hinders me from playing, and the only way to change that is playing more.
How is that supposed to work?

Edit: Now I'm banned for 24 hours for winning 2 games. What the hell!? They are really trying their best to get rid of new players.
